channel.title: cheatsheet on 知识碎片
channel.description: Recent content in cheatsheet on 知识碎片

item.title: bash cheatsheet
item.description: time ! false && echo "output to stderr" >&2 && echo "output to stdin" |& cat #real 0m0.000s #user 0m0.000s #sys 0m0.000s #output to stderr #output to stdin { sleep 1;echo -en "first one "; } & echo -en "second one " #second one first one { sleep 1;echo -en "first one "; } ; echo -en "second one " # first one second one false && echo 1 #"" !
